Class UltraSimpleUserStorage

java.lang.Object
persistenceLayer.UltraSimpleUserStorage
public class UltraSimpleUserStorage extends Object
This class provides static methods for saving and loading various types of data, including users, pins, expenses, transactions, incomes, and categories. The data is saved and loaded using serialization to and from files.

    • saveUsers

      public static void saveUsers(List<User> users) throws IOException
      Saves a list of users to a file.
      Parameters:
      users - The list of users to be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during saving.

    • loadUsers

      public static List<User> loadUsers() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loads the list of users from the file.
      Returns:
      A list of users loaded from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during loading.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of a serialized object cannot be found.
